reviews.text: The food was really good. I'm not a steak person and when I do eat it I like it well done, but I never usually get it well done. The tenderloin was cooked perfectly and I appreciate that a lot. All 5 of our meals were very good. The prices seemed high but I don't think it was unusual for the area. The service was good and the eating area was spacious and nice. Definitely recommend if you are in the area. We got the beef tenderloin, salmon soup, Caeser salad, way you want 2, and the way you want 4 pizza.

As a regular at Manala, I‚Äôm never disappointed. The food is consistently excellent. Whether it‚Äôs a three course meal or a pizza, everything is prepared perfectly. Also the go-to place for a simple beer or more sophisticated drinks.

The staff is always friendly and attentive, making it clear they care about their customers and the quality of their service.

Nice restaurant with great service!
An oldish warm ambience halls with a nice bar area at the entrance.
The pizza menu can be defined "out of this world" elaborated with a lot of fantasy üòÖ
We tried the simplest one which has more original pizzas taste, "Terra" and it was ok.  It needs more mushrooms and the truffle oil didn't even taste.
The reindeer stew was tasty yet the meat was dry and different from what a stew would be.
The wine selection is very good but wished the wine was poured at the table to appreciate the bottle.üç∑
The waiter was present and did a great job.
üÜóüëç

My friend and I had the Chef‚Äôs Menu with some cocktails and everything was sooo good. Somewhat pricey but totally worth it. The staff was also super nice. Lovely place (location wise as well) and the vibe was cool. I highly recommend!

It's strongly recommended.
The restaurant atmosphere is excellent. The people working there are really nice, and always give good hints to order a food. I ordered moose stew and my friend ordered whitefish. Both meals were delicious. The moose was so soft and well cooked. It was served with mashed potatoes, pickle cucumbers and red berries. Pickle was not really matched with the rest but that was alright. I also ordered a glass of red wine (botta valpolicella ripasso) proposed by them which was quite good and matched with my food.
